doc.field: Michael V. D'Ambrosio and Daniel Michelson
Michael V. D'Ambrosio and Daniel Michelson
Communications Workers of America, Local 1032 Records
Communications Workers of America, Local 1032 Records
WAG.128
WAG.128

CWA Local 1032 represents about 6,000 workers in a variety of professions and fields in New Jersey state government (especially the Department of Transportation), the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, several New Jersey towns and counties as well as several private sector work sites. Headquartered in Ewing, Local 1032 also has offices in Newark and Newton. The records of CWA Local 1032 document the activities of an important New Jersey local. Executive Board material, including minutes, is especially valuable for understanding 1032. Other material in the collection includes organizing campaign files, correspondence, negotiation files, political campaign files, and grievances.

CWA Local 1032 represents about 6,000 workers in a variety of professions and fields in New Jersey state government (especially the Department of Transportation), the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, several New Jersey towns and counties as well as several private sector work sites. Headquartered in Ewing, Local 1032 also has offices in Newark and Newton. The records of CWA Local 1032 document the activities of an important New Jersey local. Executive Board material, including minutes, is especially valuable for understanding 1032. Other material in the collection includes organizing campaign files, correspondence, negotiation files, political campaign files, and grievances.

Communications Workers of America. Local 1032 (Ewing, N.J.)

The records of CWA Local 1032 document the activities of an important New Jersey local. Executive Board material, including minutes, is especially valuable for understanding 1032. Other material in the collection includes organizing campaign files, correspondence, negotiation files, political campaign files, and grievances.

CWA Local 1032 represents about 6,000 workers in a variety of professions and fields in New Jersey state government (especially the Department of Transportation), the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, several New Jersey towns and counties as well as several private sector work sites. Headquartered in Ewing, Local 1032 also has offices in Newark and Newton. Although most of the Local's membership is from New Jersey, some hail from New York.
Donated by Jim Marketti, on behalf of the Communications Workers of America, Local 1032, in 2000. The accession number associated with this gift is 1987.014

The archived website was migrated from the California Digital Library's Web Archiving Service to the Internet Archive's Archive-It Service in November 2015. The link to California Digital Library was removed in October 2017.
